!Wharf Manager Felton: Hmm.. Now that you mention it, i think i did see that person before. Yes! He asked me about the direction of the cargo ship. Then he disappeared after i told him that we were salvaging the goods from the cargo ship that had been ship wrecked near the entrance to Dvil's Isle.
